item.title: BJP Leaders Ask District Collector for Kashipuram Village Road Approval
item.description:
<![CDATA[-Advertisement-
Gadwal: Senior BJP leaders from Jogulamba Gadwal district have taken a step to improve rural infrastructure by asking for a proper road to Kashipuram village. They submitted a request to District Collector B.M. Santhosh.
The request was delivered by T. RamAnjaneyulu, BJP District President, and Gongolla Eshwar, BJP Alampur Mandal President. They stressed that Kashipuram villagers have long needed better roads, and many face difficulties due to the lack of one.
- Advertisement ...]]>
item.author: Rajesh M, Https, Latest News Hyderabad, Telangana, India, World, Please Enter Your Name Here

item.title: Gadwal Police Crack Tejeshwar Murder Case Swiftly, Honored with Cash Rewards by District SP
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: In a remarkable display of investigative efficiency and coordination, the Gadwal police team successfully cracked the high-profile Tejeshwar murder case, which had created a sensation across both Telugu-speaking states. The swift resolution of the case has drawn widespread praise from the public and law enforcement circles alike.
Recognizing their exemplary efforts, District Superintendent of Police (SP) Sri T. Srinivasa Rao, IPS, felicitated the officers and staff involved in the inves...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh

item.title: "Wife, Lover Orchestrate Chilling Honour Killing in Jogulamba Gadwal â€“ 8 Arrested in Swift Police Crackdown"
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: A sensational murder case that shook both Telugu states has been cracked within a short period by the Jogulamba Gadwal district police. The investigation revealed that a wife and her paramour conspired to murder her husband, who was allegedly obstructing their illicit relationship. They hired a supari gang (contract killers) to carry out the murder.
District Superintendent of Police (SP) T. Srinivasa Rao, IPS, conducted a press meet today revealing crucial details of the case.
Case Bac...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
